gallery.name: ALIVE
gallery.info: Developed E-learning platform for New York University with MERN stack. Worked with UI team to ship responsive and isomorphic website for multiple browsers, monitors. Also messed around with API design and UI.
gallery.answer: MongoDB, Express, React/Redux, Node, GraphQL, Figma

gallery.name: Spotify Data Viz
gallery.info: A web app to visualize user's profile, playlists, followers, recently played songs. Also includes the frequently played song for within 4 weeks and 6 months. Songs includes detailed sound information. Create and modify your playlists with recommended songs based on your playlists and more.
gallery.answer: React, Node, Express, REST API, Styled-Component, Mixins

gallery.name: Fruit Chat
gallery.info: Web app for cloning twitter's functionality such as post, comment, like, notification, deletion. Includes user authorization with Json Web Token to manage login, register, and session. Responsive and minimal design for chat app.
gallery.answer: React, Redux, NodeJS, Express, Material UI, Firebase, REST API, JWT

gallery.name: Letgo Furniture
gallery.info: React Native app for selling furnitures, includes user authentication and authorization, post listings, contact the seller, and more.
gallery.answer: React, React Native, Node, NPM, Expo

gallery.name: Shop Ramen
gallery.info: Dynamic and responsive shopping website using GatsbyJS, with cart functionality for modify and calculate items in the cart and Paypal API for checkout.
gallery.answer: React, Redux, Gatsby, Netlify, Bootstrap, Contentful, Styled-Component

gallery.name: To Do List
gallery.info: Add/delete task, categorize task, light/dark mode, accessibility, quick add task
gallery.answer: React, Firebase, React Testing Library, SCSS

gallery.name: COVID Tracker
gallery.info: Used REST API to fetch data and Chart.js to display COVID-19 data
gallery.answer: React, REST API, CSS Modules, Chart.js

gallery.name: Quiz Generator
gallery.info: Used REST API to generate quiz by category and number
